greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest prime factor of n-th triangular number n(n+1)/2.
mathematica: PrimeFactors[n_]:=Flatten[Table[ #[[1]],{1}]&/@FactorInteger[n]]; Table[PrimeFactors[n*(n-1)/2][[ -1]],{n,3,6!}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 12 2009 *)
xref: Cf. A069901, A069903, A069904. Essentially the same as A074399.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2002
